description: prompts to present when transferring an NEV file
author: M. Best

prompts.info: Specify the study/trial this file should be associated with.
prompts.text: Which study/trial is this file for?

prompts.info: Which data acquisition system was used to create this recording?
prompts.text: which data acquisition system was used to create this recording?

prompts.info: Which type of connector was used to create this recording?
prompts.text: which type of connector was used to create this recording?

prompts.info: From which anatomical area was this recording?
prompts.text: From which anatomical area was this recording?

prompts.info: You can provide an optional note or comment.
prompts.text: Description, note, or comment to include?
prompts.example: This is the crucial data file in this study.
